content: Given an LocalDefId which is definitely pointing to some kind of fn, how can I get the span of the parameter list? (EG, (a: i32) or ())
hmm, I don't know if you can get just the parameter list
for the span of the function signature, you can use def_span https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ty/struct.TyCtxt.html?search=#method.def_span
Thank you, I think the signature is really what I want anyways
